faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about Dimension-X.

whatIsDimensionX.question: What is Dimension-X?
whatIsDimensionX.answer: Dimension-X is a game where magic and technology collide, offering players a unique multiverse experience.

howToStart.question: How do I start playing?
howToStart.answer: The game is now public with limited functionality! To play your first campaign, register on the site and reach out to a game master through our Discord. Check our Newcomer's Guide for detailed information on getting started and our Player Cheat Sheet for quick reference during gameplay. You can also interact with our AI assistant or contact the creator directly for help.

canSwitchDimensions.question: Can I switch dimensions?
canSwitchDimensions.answer: Yes! Dimension switching is a core feature of the game, allowing players to explore different dimensions with varying effects on gameplay. Each dimension has unique properties that affect your character's abilities and resources.

whoDeveloping.question: Who is developing Dimension-X?
whoDeveloping.answer: Dimension-X is being developed by a single person who is passionate about creating immersive game experiences.

whenAvailable.question: When will Dimension-X be available?
whenAvailable.answer: Dimension-X is now available with limited functionality! We're in an early access phase where players can join campaigns led by game masters. We're continuously adding new features and expanding the game. Stay updated on our progress by subscribing to our newsletter or following us on social media.

provideFeedback.question: Can I provide feedback or suggestions?
provideFeedback.answer: Yes, we welcome your feedback and suggestions. Please use the contact form on our website to reach out to the creator.

stayUpdated.question: Is there a way to stay updated on the game's progress?
stayUpdated.answer: Absolutely! You can subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on social media for the latest updates and news about Dimension-X.

betaTesting.question: Is the game in beta testing?
betaTesting.answer: Yes, we're currently in an early access phase! Players can already join campaigns and experience the core gameplay. This phase helps us gather feedback and improve the game. If you're playing now, you're already part of our testing community - thank you for your support!

platforms.question: What platforms is Dimension-X available on?
platforms.answer: Dimension-X is currently available on PC through our web platform. We're focusing on providing the best experience on this platform before considering expansions to other platforms in the future.

supportDevelopment.question: How can I support the development of Dimension-X?
supportDevelopment.answer: The best way to support us now is by playing the game, providing feedback on your experience, and reporting any issues you encounter. You can also help by inviting friends to join campaigns, sharing your gameplay experiences on social media, and engaging with our community on Discord. Your participation during this early access phase is invaluable to our development process!

whatIsIt.title: What Is Dimension-X (DX)?
whatIsIt.subtitle: A modern take on tabletop roleplaying, powered by digital tools

introduction.title: What is Tabletop Roleplay?
introduction.subtitle: Never Played D&D or Roleplaying Games?
introduction.description:
Dimension-X is like a collective video game, but instead of a computer telling the story, a real person does, and you play as the main character.

Imagine...
• Like a movie where you're the director — you decide what your character does
• Like a book you write together — everyone plays their own hero
• Like a video game, but without limitations — you can try to do anything
introduction.targetAudience: Whether you're a complete beginner to roleplaying games or an experienced player, Dimension-X offers an accessible yet deep gaming experience.
introduction.benefits: Roleplaying games help develop creativity, problem-solving skills, teamwork, and storytelling abilities - all while having fun with friends!
introduction.imageCaption: Game interface showing player actions and environment

worldOverview.title: Welcome to the Year 3000 HE
worldOverview.description: Welcome to the year 3000 HE, where humanity has evolved beyond recognition. In Dimension-X, mystical energy called the Flow permeates everything, powering both ancient magic and cutting-edge technology. Ten parallel dimensions exist, each with unique dangers and time flows, accessible to those brave or foolish enough to venture beyond the safety of the 1st dimension.

conflict.title: The Eternal Conflict
conflict.description: Centuries ago, two visionaries sparked a war that still defines the world:

paths.title: JSon
paths.description: A legendary mage who could bend reality with pure Flow manipulation

paths.title: John Casey
paths.description: A brilliant inventor who created technology to give everyone dimensional powers

players.name: Aria Starveil
players.description: The most powerful mage of her generation, mysteriously vanished after venturing into the 5th dimension. Her reserved table at Misfits Bar still waits for her return.

players.name: Eva Chan
players.description: Once a legendary tech warrior, she descended into madness and slaughtered an entire mercenary base before disappearing into the dimensions. Some say her blue glow can still be seen.

players.name: The Jeck
players.description: A cybernetic samurai who leads the DzenDojo Clan, perfectly balancing martial arts with technological enhancement.

players.name: Dig Collins
players.description: Founder of the Era Clan, a tech genius whose "Big Bang Incident" disabled every machine in a kilometer radius during a bank heist.

worldToday.title: The World Today
worldToday.description: City of Memories serves as the starting point for all newcomers, centered around the Memorial where JSon and John first fought. Here at Misfits Bar, mercenaries, mages, and tech warriors drink at the same tables (mostly without killing each other). FlowGuards maintain brutal order across dimensions, while MediServ offers healing to those who can afford it. Countless mercenary clans hunt artifacts in the dangerous upper dimensions, where time flows differently and shadow creatures with glowing blue eyes lurk in the storms.

yourChoice.title: Your Choice
yourChoice.description: Touch the Memorial, feel the Flow awaken within you, and choose your path: Embrace pure magic and wield reality-bending spells, augment yourself with cybernetics and high-tech weaponry, or remain human and rely on skill, luck, and the right gear. In Dimension-X, power comes in many forms, but survival depends on how well you use it.

worldOverview.conclusion: The shadows are watching. The Flow is calling. What will you become?
